name: Plunny
description:
**First time loading might take a little bit loger than expected **

A game made for $100 JTAGame jam #4.

Theme : Take 1 leave the rest.

----------------------------------------------------------

This is a small action game where you need to survive as long as possible while choosing cards that effects you and the enemies.  You can reach higher stage by killing enemies. Whenever you reach a new stage. There's a chance to pick 1 card out of 3 cards. The card you picked will benefit you while the other two might make your enemies stronger.  Chose wisely!

---CONTROL---

1. Use W/A/S/D to move.

2. Click Left Mouse to shoot the enemies.

3. When moving to the next stage, there will be 3 cards display on the screen. Take one card by clicking it. The card you take will have positive effect on you (the effect displays at the top side of the card). The other two cards you left will have negetive effects that make the enemies stronger and more dangerous (the effect displays at the buttom side of the card).

Try your best to get a high score.  Don't forge to share your highest score on the comment down below :).
